name: part_005
file: tmp_【3D BIRTHDAY LIVE】 Through the Curious Tune - Anya Melfissa 2025 Birthday Live 生誕祭ライブ #CuriousTune3D [FXLKbTnMP2M]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Anya, Flare, IRyS, and Luna talk about their previous performance and Luna offers Anya some tea.
Anya drinks the tea and suddenly becomes a giant, accidentally stepping on IRyS.
Anya turns tiny after Luna pours more tea on her. The guests tease tiny Anya before leaving.
Anya Melfissa, Kureiji Ollie, and Pavolia Reine perform the song 'Supernova'.

subtitles.original: 高いところと低いところでボボボボボボって
subtitles.english: With the high parts and low parts going bo-bo-bo-bo...

subtitles.original: ああ、確かにね
subtitles.english: Ah, that's true.

subtitles.original: 低いところばっかだったよ私
subtitles.english: I was doing nothing but the low parts.

subtitles.original: ありましたね。でもすごかった、かっこよかったですよ。ゴロゴロ〜とかも
subtitles.english: You were. But it was amazing, you sounded so cool. Even the growling parts.

subtitles.original: 本当？イケボアイリス出したことないよって
subtitles.english: Really? I've never really done 'cool-voice IRyS' before.

subtitles.original: イケボアイリス珍しいからさ、たまにはいいんじゃないかな
subtitles.english: Cool-voice IRyS is rare, so I think it's good once in a while.

subtitles.original: ま、確かにね。こういうイケボアイリス、レアなんでね
subtitles.english: Well, true. This kind of cool-voice IRyS is a rarity.

subtitles.original: 8歳だもんね
subtitles.english: Since you're 8 years old.

subtitles.original: 8歳なのにね
subtitles.english: Even though I'm 8.

subtitles.original: もう、もうね、それはそれとして。みんな受け取ってね
subtitles.english: Geez, anyway, that aside. Everyone, please take it in...

subtitles.original: アイリスのかっこよさを
subtitles.english: ...IRyS's coolness.

subtitles.original: 8歳... 8歳... ごめんなさい
subtitles.english: 8 years old... 8 years old... I'm sorry.

subtitles.original: 絶対この後アーカイブ見返して
subtitles.english: You absolutely have to watch the archive again after this.

subtitles.original: やだやだ、見たくない
subtitles.english: No, no, I don't want to see it!

subtitles.original: 見返してほしい。回すたびに今度は見よ
subtitles.english: I want you to rewatch it. Watch it every time it loops.

subtitles.original: でもアーニャのライブはちゃんと見てね。この部分だけ飛ばして
subtitles.english: But make sure you watch Anya's live properly. Just skip this part.

subtitles.original: 一番大事なとこでしょ
subtitles.english: That's the most important part!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ喉乾いてんな
subtitles.english: Man, my throat is so dry.

subtitles.original: あら？喉乾いてきた？
subtitles.english: Oh? Are you getting thirsty?

subtitles.original: 急に喉乾いてきたわ。このテンションで喉乾いたわ
subtitles.english: Suddenly my throat is parched. This excitement made me thirsty.

subtitles.original: なら乾いた。あ、アーニャお腹空いた... あ、お飲み物ないかな？
subtitles.english: Then I'm dry. Ah, Anya is hungry... Ah, is there anything to drink?

subtitles.original: あ、なんか来た、なんか来た
subtitles.english: Oh, something's coming, something's coming.

subtitles.original: アーニャちゃん！たくさん歌って喉乾いたでしょ？
subtitles.english: Anya-chan! You've been singing a lot, so you must be thirsty, right?

subtitles.original: そうだよ
subtitles.english: That's right.

subtitles.original: これ飲んでほしいのら
subtitles.english: I want you to drink this, nanora.

subtitles.original: 何その声？
subtitles.english: What's with that voice?

subtitles.original: こぼしてる、こぼしてる。なんか熱そうなの出てきた
subtitles.english: She's spilling it, she's spilling it. Something hot-looking came out.

subtitles.original: はい、これは
subtitles.english: Here, this is...

subtitles.original: 何これ？怪しいな。熱っ！これ何？
subtitles.english: What is this? Suspicious. Hot! What is this?

subtitles.original: ねえ、湯気立ってる。熱っ、熱っ
subtitles.english: Hey, it's steaming. Hot, hot!

subtitles.original: 熱そうだよ、本当
subtitles.english: It really looks hot.

subtitles.original: うんとこどっこいしょ熱いもの。飲んで、飲んで
subtitles.english: Heave-ho, something really hot. Drink it, drink it.

subtitles.original: まあ一旦飲むか。飲んで飲んで
subtitles.english: Well, I guess I'll try it. Drink up, drink up.

subtitles.original: 本当に飲んだ！本当に飲んだ！
subtitles.english: She actually drank it! She actually drank it!

subtitles.original: 美味しい？美味しい？
subtitles.english: Is it good? Is it good?

subtitles.original: ふぅ... めっちゃ、めっちゃ美味しかったよ。でも
subtitles.english: Phew... It was really, really delicious. But...

subtitles.original: 本当？怪しかったけどさ、めっちゃ美味しかった？
subtitles.english: Really? It was suspicious, but it was really delicious?

subtitles.original: よかった... 美味しかったならよかった
subtitles.english: Good... I'm glad if it was tasty.

subtitles.original: うわー！え、何、何？
subtitles.english: Whoa! Eh, what, what?!

subtitles.original: え、どういうこと？デカくなった？
subtitles.english: Wait, what's happening? Did I get big?!

subtitles.original: アーニャ！どういうこと？
subtitles.english: Anya! What's going on?!

subtitles.original: デカっ！あんまり動き回らないでよ
subtitles.english: She's huge! Don't move around too much!

subtitles.original: デカくなっちゃった！ねえ、すごい揺れるね。これ潰れるかな？
subtitles.english: I've become huge! Hey, it's shaking like crazy. Is this gonna collapse?

subtitles.original: みんな潰れるじゃん。ガミガミやめてよ
subtitles.english: We're all gonna get crushed! Stop nagging me!

subtitles.original: あ！アイリス！
subtitles.english: Ah! IRyS!

subtitles.original: ああー！！
subtitles.english: AAAAAAHH!!

subtitles.original: 残りはルーナ先輩、元に戻してくださいよ。じゃないと、潰しちゃうぞ
subtitles.english: Luna-senpai, turn me back to normal. Or else I'll crush you!

subtitles.original: 潰しちゃうぞー
subtitles.english: I'll crush you~!

subtitles.original: ねえ、もしかしてお茶かければ元に戻るの？
subtitles.english: Hey, maybe if I pour tea on myself, I'll turn back?

subtitles.original: 暴力、暴力はやめて！
subtitles.english: Violence! Stop the violence!

subtitles.original: それだ、やってよルーナ！
subtitles.english: That's it! Do it, Luna!

subtitles.original: やっちゃうよ。頼む、もう一回かけてみる。足元に。普通にかけるのら
subtitles.english: I'll do it! Please, I'll try pouring it one more time. On her feet. Just regular pouring, nanora.

subtitles.original: 戻れるかな？あ、戻った！え？
subtitles.english: Can she return? Oh, she's back! Eh?

subtitles.original: さっきはよくもやってくれたな
subtitles.english: You really put me through it earlier.

subtitles.original: ルーナ先輩、ルーナ先輩、どういう飲み物なんですかそれ？
subtitles.english: Luna-senpai, Luna-senpai, what kind of drink is that exactly?

subtitles.original: 小さくなったならね
subtitles.english: Well, now she's gotten tiny.

subtitles.original: そんなことはどうだっていいんだよ。なんなん、さっきはよくも踏みつけてやってくれたね
subtitles.english: Never mind that! What the heck, you had the nerve to trample on me earlier!

subtitles.original: アーニャ、アーニャちゃん、ちっちゃくて可愛いね。餌あげたいよ。餌あげたくなっちゃった
subtitles.english: Anya, Anya-chan, you're so small and cute! I want to feed you. I feel like giving you a treat.

subtitles.original: 酷いことしないで。可愛いから、ご褒美あげちゃう
subtitles.english: Don't do anything mean! Since you're so cute, I'll give you a reward.

subtitles.original: え、どういうご褒美？
subtitles.english: Eh? What kind of reward?

subtitles.original: アーニャちゃん、おっと、それは... それは... アイリスの足が！
subtitles.english: Anya-chan, oops, that's... that's... IRyS's leg!

subtitles.original: パンチラと見せかけてパンチ！
subtitles.english: A punch disguised as a panty shot!

subtitles.original: 待って、なんて残酷な。痛い、痛い。ちょっと2歳児にやることじゃないよ
subtitles.english: Wait, how cruel! Ouch, ouch! Hey, that's not something you do to a 2-year-old!

subtitles.original: 2歳児だと思います？2歳児、2歳児だよ、こんなにちっちゃくて。可愛いね
subtitles.english: You think she's a 2-year-old? A 2-year-old, she really is a 2-year-old, being this tiny. So cute.

subtitles.original: アーニャにさ、プレゼントもあげたことだし、そろそろ帰ろっか
subtitles.english: Well, we've given Anya her present, so it's about time we headed home.

subtitles.original: 帰るのね。時間だし、じゃあね
subtitles.english: Heading home then. It's time, so see ya!

subtitles.original: 待って、その前に元に戻してくださいよ。ちょっと待って、ちょっと待って！
subtitles.english: Wait, turn me back before you go! Wait a second! Wait a second!!

subtitles.original: Here we go, thank you! The party's over.
subtitles.english: Here we go, thank you! The party's over.

subtitles.original: お芝居はおしまい
subtitles.english: The play is over.

subtitles.original: 止まらない weekend, weekend
subtitles.english: Unstoppable weekend, weekend.

subtitles.original: Always be in the show, the show time
subtitles.english: Always be in the show, the show time.

subtitles.original: Wow! Get up, get ready!
subtitles.english: Wow! Get up, get ready!

subtitles.original: 新しい今も back up してくれないように
subtitles.english: So that even the new 'now' won't hold us back.

subtitles.original: ぐるぐる回る 必ず追いついて見せるから
subtitles.english: Spinning round and round, I'll definitely show you I can catch up.

subtitles.original: 遠く今待って 正しいことは与えられてた
subtitles.english: Wait far away now, the right things were given to us.

subtitles.original: 送り足を送れたのは君だけ
subtitles.english: The only one who could send me off was you.

subtitles.original: 愛していたい二人じゃなきゃ始まらない
subtitles.english: I want to keep loving you, it won't start unless it's the two of us.

subtitles.original: 歪なステップでもいい 今は君と踊っていたい
subtitles.english: Distorted steps are fine, I just want to dance with you right now.

subtitles.original: ただ生きるためのまじないをそこに残した
subtitles.english: I left a charm there just for the sake of living.

subtitles.original: 命を負ってほしい君と短く長い季節を辿って
subtitles.english: I want you to bear this life, as we trace through short and long seasons together.

subtitles.original: ないないまで はじめまして あら
subtitles.english: Until nothing is left, nice to meet you. Oh?
